page.title: 05COMMUNICATIONS
page.content: Postal deliveries and collections in our area are made from Newton Abbot. The postman delivers letters and empties post boxes twice each weekday and once on Saturdays. There is no Sunday delivery or collection. The postman travels in a small van. Most telephones in the area are on the Shaldon exchange although some houses in Gabwell, Stokeinteignhead have Torquay numbers. In August l985 all 4 figure numbers were changed to 6 figure numbers by adding 87. The school's telephone number is now Shaldon 873208. The public telephone boxes are being modernized at the present time.
